price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: “Adasamma, nokorε sε medeε meyε kͻkͻbͻni pefee ma mo”.
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul yāayyuhā al-nāsu innamā anā lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
